overview: Compilation of 1974 backdrop films (dubbed with music from the 16 November 1974 gig). Tracks: On The Run, Time, Money, Us And Them, Any Colour You Like, Brain Damage / Eclipse. Also contains backdrop movies from Welcome To The Machine, Signs Of Life and Learning To Fly. Final track is called 'Odds & Sods'.
title: Pink Floyd: Dusty Tapes
